abstract: At a time when networks favor internal producers, the company is heading into the fall season with an unusual 45 shows in production.
snippet: At a time when networks favor internal producers, the company is heading into the fall season with an unusual 45 shows in production.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  Three years ago, J. J. Abrams had to decide whether to keep making television shows for the Walt Disney Company or move to a new home base. A bidding war had broken out for him.

headline.main: Defying an Industry Trend, Warner Is Easily the Top Producer of TV Shows
headline.print_headline: Defying an Industry Trend, Warner Is Easily the Top Producer of TV Shows
